features: 【FOLDABLE BROOM AND DUSTPAN】Broom snaps can be disassemble to occupy minimum space as possible .

【BROOM AND DUSTPAN SET OF DESIGN】Broom's head is rotatable, Broom head clicks into place at different angles with a tap of your foot,Great for ergonomic sweeping, accessing tight spaces and reaching into ceiling corners.Dustpan features lock in open position for easy emptying and folding and dustpan is pivoted.
【DUSTPAN TEETH OF USE】 Dustpan features teeth which can comb out dirt and dust from Broom bristles, and with the help of the dustpan edge’s rubber, you can sweep dust and small dirt.
【BROOM AND DUSTPAN EFFORTLESS】37 inch long handle broom and large-capacity dustpan perfect for sweeping large areas and long handle allow you to Stand upright for comfortable sweeping
【BROOM AND DUSTPAN SET OF SAVE SPACE】 Broom snaps to Dustpan for upright storage and can be disassemble to occupy minimum space as possible when moving.
body.description: Broom and dustpan set upright Kitchen broom and dustpan set Gold broom and dustpan set Pink broom and dustpan set Broom and Dustpan/Dust Pan and Broom Combo Set If you are looking for any easy way to sweep office, house, kitchen, outdoors and indoors, our Dustpan and broom is a perfect and clever choice. Made of Brand New ABS material,Sturdy and Durable, Long handle broom allow you to stand upright for comfortable sweeping, Dustpan teeth can comb out dirt and dust from broom bristles, large-capacity dustpan allow you sweep larger areas. When you friends move to new house,office or Commercial Store, our dustpan and broom set is a wonderful gift. The versatile Set has a full-size broom and extra-large dustpan, perfect for any sweeping task. When it's fully extended, the broom and dustpan are great for sweeping large areas, and then the broom retracts with a quick twist to easily sweep dirt piles into the dustpan. The broom has bristles resulting in a larger surface area and a soft, feathered texture that effectively grabs dust and dirt. The dustpan features teeth to comb out dirt and a flexible lip that conforms to surfaces so dust is not swept underneath it. The dustpan locks open for easy emptying. The lightweight, aluminum pole with non-slip grips is easy to maneuver, and the broom snaps into the closed dustpan for upright, compact storage. Package include: 1 x Self Cleaning Broom 1 x Dustpan Teeth dustpan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works just not for heavy duty jobs!
reviews.reviewText: Don’t like that it feels flimsy but it’s a great duster actually!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great broom and dustpan duo
reviews.reviewText: This is sturdy, lightweight, and works great. Everybody in my household is more willing to sweep up all our hardwood and vinyl floors because of how easy it is to use.The main selling point for me was the built-in bristle comb on the dustpan. I love using this feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Save your money and buy something else.
reviews.reviewText: When the highest praise you can give is "light weight" and "easy to assemble" … this thing is literally a piece of garbage. It comes apart when sweeping - if it doesn't break, like mine did (where the broom assembles in two pieces - but super glue held it together). The swinging bucket won't stay, the thing constantly falls over; I can go on, but it's not worth it. If I didn't want to kill the planet more I'd just throw it away. Save your money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good looking but not the best at sweeping
reviews.reviewText: I love the look- and frankly, that’s why I bought it. However, the bristles are so soft and not very dense so it doesn’t sweep up items very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble and Solid
reviews.reviewText: This upright broom and dustpan were easy to assemble. Unlike some dustpans, this one is not curved. This means it did not have to be pushed down in order to prevent sweepings from going under the dustpan. The set had a solid feel and the broom head and dustpan do not swivel as some that are screwed into the sticks tend to.I would have preferred that the dustpan handle did not end in a 45-degree angle. If there could be holes in the handles so the set could be hung from a hook, there would have been better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this broom and pan set because it has the COMB attached to the pan. The "comb" works very well removing strings and hair from the bristles. Only a vacuum could work better and not by a whole lot. Worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Very very small. Guess it’ll hold me over until I get a real broom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2020
reviews.reviewText: At first I thought it was flimsy but it’s perfect. It’s sturdy enough but not heavy at all. I love that you can brush off any hair or stuff stuck on the broom with that cleaning brush option it has.

reviews.reviewTitle: very bed item. I steel not got replaced
reviews.reviewText: Very poor service. I got damage product and still I am not got replaced.
